Attribute.Description: Valid values: Y/N.
Attribute.Name: Export_Flag

Attribute.Description: Valid values: Y/N.
Attribute.Name: Single_Carton_Shipments

Attribute.Description: Valid values: Y/N.
Attribute.Name: Pack_And_Hold

Entity.Description: Pick process determination.
Entity.Name: Pla_Activity_Deter

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PLA_ACTIVITY_DETER table.
Attribute.Name: Pla_Activity_Deter_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PLA_ACTIVITY_DETER table.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Strategy_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the shipments belonging to this enterprise satisfy the Shipment Selector.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PLA_ACTIVITY_DETER table.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: A brief description of the Pick process determination.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: In a warehouse, the pick process code defines the overall process for executing order picking. This field can take one of the pre-defined values (ItemPick, OrderPick, BatchPick).
Attribute.Name: Activity_Code

Attribute.Description: It indicates the task type to be used from the staging zone to the final destination.
Attribute.Name: Order_Pick_Task_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items that are grouped under the item classification or category one.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_1

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are grouped under the item classification or category two.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_2

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are grouped under the item classification or category three.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_3

Attribute.Description: This field indicates if the activity is specified for this alternate unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: UOM

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this activity applies to only single line shipments.
Attribute.Name: Single_Line_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this activity applies to only single unit shipments.
Attribute.Name: Single_Unit_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the demand based constraints will be used to evaluate the activity condition.
Attribute.Name: Consider_Demand

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the cases are considered while computing the total quantity.
Attribute.Name: Exclude_Case_From_Demand

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the pallets are considered while computing the total quantity.
Attribute.Name: Exclude_Pallet_From_Demand

Attribute.Description: Use this activity if the total quantity for an item in the wave exceeds the specified criteria.
Attribute.Name: Min_No_Of_Packages

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the minimum number of packages.
Attribute.Name: Min_No_Of_Packages_UOM

Attribute.Description: Use this strategy if a single unit shipment for an item in the wave exceeds this quantity.
Attribute.Name: Min_No_Of_Single_Unit_Shipment

Attribute.Description: Use this strategy if the number of shipments with the same profileID in the wave exceeds this quantity.
Attribute.Name: Min_Shmnts_Same_ProfileID

Attribute.Description: Use this strategy if a single unit shipping cartons for an item in the wave exceeds this quantity.
Attribute.Name: Min_No_Of_Single_Unit_Carton

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the mode of shipment used for shipping.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Mode

Entity.Name: Shipment_Group

Attribute.Name: Shipment_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: This field identifies the shipment group.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: A brief description of the shipment group.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SHIPMENT_GROUP table.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the sequence number for the shipment group.
Attribute.Name: Seq_No

Attribute.Description: Valid values are: 1 - Urgent, 2 - High, 3 - Normal (Default), 4 - Low.

Attribute.Name: Pick_Strategy_Key

Attribute.Name: Sort_Strategy_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the pipeline this wave belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Pipeline_Key

Attribute.Description: Valid values are: Auto, Manual, Conditional. If it is conditional then either Min_Volume or Min_No_Of_Shipments should be specified.
Attribute.Name: Accept_Wave

Attribute.Description: If the number of shipments in a wave exceeds this number, the wave will be accepted automatically depending on the accept_value.
Attribute.Name: Min_No_Of_Shipments

Attribute.Description: If volume of the wave exceeds this number, the wave will be accepted automatically depending on the accept_value.
Attribute.Name: Min_Volume

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the number of waves that were released concurrently.
Attribute.Name: No_Of_Concurrent_Waves

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the number of waves that needs to be processed for a shipment group.
Attribute.Name: Max_Waves_To_Process

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the to status of the wave considered for limiting the waves being processed.
Attribute.Name: To_Wave_Status

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the date on which the shipment group is available.
Attribute.Name: Effective_Date_From

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the date after which this shipment group is not available.
Attribute.Name: Effective_Date_To

Attribute.Name: Shipment_Selector_Key

Attribute.Name: Shipment_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: A brief description of the shipment selectors.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SHIPMENT_SELECTOR table.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the priority code of the order. The external logic can be built for prioritizing orders.
Attribute.Name: Priority_Code

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the shipments belonging to this enterprise satisfy the shipment selector.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the shipments belonging to this document type satisfy the shipment selector.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that this shipment selector is applicable only if the shipment's value exceeds this value.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Value

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the currency of the shipment value.
Attribute.Name: Currency

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the order classification attribute.
Attribute.Name: Order_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the delivery method for the product line.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Method

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the mode of shipment.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Mode

Attribute.Description: The Standard Carrier Alpha Code (SCAC) assigned to identify the carrier.
Attribute.Name: Scac

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the country code from where the merchandise is being shipped.
Attribute.Name: Ship_To_Country

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the starting zip code of the zip code range.
Attribute.Name: From_Zip

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the zip code where the range ends.
Attribute.Name: To_Zip

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the number of digits or characters in the Start and End Zip codes.
Attribute.Name: Zip_Code_Length

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment selector applies to only single line shipments.
Attribute.Name: Single_Line_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment selector applies to only single item shipments.
Attribute.Name: Single_Item_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment selector applies only to pack and hold shipments.
Attribute.Name: Pack_And_Hold

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment selector applies to only shipments with "Value Added Services".
Attribute.Name: Shipment_With_VAS

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment selector applies to only shipments that have past the ship date.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Date_Past_Due

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the shipment selector applies only to shipments that have past the delivery date or cancel date.
Attribute.Name: Del_Cancel_Date_Past_Due

Attribute.Description: This shipment selector is applicable to delinquent shipments whose ship date is past due and delivery date and cancel date is within this value in hours.
Attribute.Name: Del_Cancel_Date_Delq_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This shipment selector is applicable to Risk/Regular shipments whose ship date is within this value in hours.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Date_Within

Attribute.Description: This shipment selector is applicable to Risk/Regular shipments whose delivery date and cancel date is within this value in hours.
Attribute.Name: Del_Cancel_Date_Risk_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are grouped under the item classification one.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_1

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are grouped under the item classification two.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_2

Attribute.Description: Item classification or category.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_3

Attribute.Description: This is the custom condition provided for selection of shipment in the wave.
Attribute.Name: Custom_Condition

Attribute.Description: Indicates if shipments past pick date are eligible for picking through this shipment selector.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Date_Past_Due

Attribute.Description: Indicates that shipments whose pick dates are within this period are eligible to picked up.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Date_Within

Attribute.Description: Indicates if only planned shipments should get included.
Attribute.Name: Include_Only_Planned_Shipments

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: The entity stores Sort Strategy for a Shipment Group in a node. Sort Strategy is used to assign lanes (also called sorting stations) for shipments which undergo waving process in the node.
Entity.Name: Sort_Strategy

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SORT_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Sort_Strategy_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SORT_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: A brief description of the sort strategy.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SORT_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Owner_Shipment_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether sorting by carrier is necessary.
Attribute.Name: Sort_By_Carrier

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SORT_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Sort_Equip_Type

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SORT_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Sort_Equip_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates whether the shipments are sorted manually or automatically. If automated, the shipments are sorted by the Equipment ID field. Otherwise, shipments are sorted manually in the zone.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Sort

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether sorting by shipment is necessary.
Attribute.Name: Sort_By_Shipment

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SORT_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Sort_Equip_Type

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_SORT_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Sort_Equip_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the zone in which shipments are manually sorted.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to use staging locations of the dock for sorting when dock is assigned.
Attribute.Name: Use_Staging_Locations

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: Size constraints for wave.
Entity.Name: Wave_Size_Constraint

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute.
Attribute.Name: Wave_Size_Constraint_Key

Attribute.Description: A brief description of the wave size constraint.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_SHIPMENT_GROUP.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_WAVE_SIZE_CONSTRAINT table.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the wave size constrint is applicable to the enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The carrier.
Attribute.Name: Scac

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the service code associated with the carrier.
Attribute.Name: Carrier_Service_Code

Attribute.Description: Mode of shipment.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Mode

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the wave size constraint is applicable for shipments that have more than one line.
Attribute.Name: Multi_Line_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the wave size constraint is applicable for shipments that have more than one shipping carton.
Attribute.Name: Multi_Case_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether shipments with different profileID's can be put together in the same wave or not .
Attribute.Name: Do_Not_Mix_ProfileID

Attribute.Description: This indicates the number of same profileID shipments after which profile mixing is not allowed .
Attribute.Name: Shmnt_Profile_Threshold

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are classified as first for the wave size constraint.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_1

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are classified as second for the wave size constraint.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_2

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are classified as third for the wave size constraint.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_3

Attribute.Description: Thid field indicates the maximum number of loads allowed for the pick criteria.
Attribute.Name: Max_No_Of_Loads

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the maximum number of shipments allowed for the pick criteria.
Attribute.Name: Max_No_Of_Shipments

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the maximum number of cases allowed for the pick criteria.
Attribute.Name: Max_No_Of_Cases

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the maximum number of shipment lines allowed for the pick criteria.
Attribute.Name: Max_No_Of_Shipment_Lines

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the maximum number of distinct SKUs (ItemId/UOM/ProductClass combination) allowed for the pick criteria.
Attribute.Name: Max_No_Of_Skus

Attribute.Description: Maximum volume.
Attribute.Name: Max_Volume

Attribute.Description: Maximum effort allowed for the criteria.
Attribute.Name: Max_Effort

Attribute.Description: Effort UOM associated with the criteria.
Attribute.Name: Effort_UOM

Attribute.Description: Resource Pool associated with the effort.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Pool_Key
